verses.roman:
sannyāsīke eta khāoyāñā kara dharma nāśa!
ataeva jāninu,--tomāra kichu nāhi bhāsa'

synonyms: sannyāsīke—sannyāsīs; eta—so much; khāoyāñā—inducing to eat; kara dharma nāśa—you spoil their religious principles; ataeva—therefore; jāninu—I can understand; tomāra—your; kichu nāhi bhāsa—there is no advancement.
translation: "Also, by inducing sannyāsīs to eat so much, you spoil their religious principles. Therefore I can understand that you have no advancement.'
